author: Staff Reporter
text: Pallavaram police arrested a 28-year-old man on charges of driving his wife to suicide on Saturday. Muthukani (28) of Lakshmi Nagar in Tirusulam, who was working in Thirumudivakkam, married Sahaya Rani (24), a nurse, four months ago. He had allegedly harassed her for money for buying a house. Unable to put up with it, she killed herself at home on Saturday, police said. Pallavaram police removed the body for a post-mortem examination. An investigation by the Revenue Divisional Officer was conducted and Muthukani was arrested. Sneha’s suicide prevention helpline can be reached at 2464 0050.
title: Woman’s suicide: husband arrested
